questions.quote: I wish that was all needed. Life can be so confusing. I..I'm searching for answers, anywhere.
Oh. Jerry, You know what just hit me? I was thinking -- What size suit are you?
Long Island?!?! I thought I was gettin' advice from a Chinese woman!!
Then we ended up going out to lunch and he had some great gossip about James Thurber.
Excuse me... we've been waiting here. Now, I KNOW we were ahead of that guy, he just came in.
What? Every time I leave my house now I have to call everybody I know and ask them if they want to do what I'm doing?
Why do they call it Ovaltine? The mug is round. The jar is round. They should call it round tine. That's gold, Jerry! Gold!
Good.  Oh--and Elaine. You know the Baltimore cap you got in your office? Wear it. I'm gonna have a little fun with him.
Oh hey, you know I invited Mike Moffit. You don't mind, do you?
Can't it? Or is your entire world just crashing down all around you?
